header.descriptionSwitcher: Change the language from the site

cardDog.title: Feed your Woffriend
cardDog.description: Come learn about your lifelong partner's diet. Take care of them and fill their little belly!

cardCat.title: Feed your Meawfriend!
cardCat.description: Your feline friend deserves the best that food can offer too. Come fill their bowl

cardBird.title: Feed your Chirpfriend!
cardBird.description: Did you know that there are foods your flying friend can't eat? Come and find out how to feed him properly!

blog.title: Caliblog
blog.subtitle: Want to know everything about your pets?
blog.text: With CaliBlog, you can fly through the most comprehensive content about pets and always discover something new. Check it out!

medias.title: Our Medias
medias.subtitle: Want to be our Woffriend, Meawfriend ou Chirpfriend? Follow us!
medias.text: Follow us on our social networks and keep up to date with all the latest news!

rights.slogan: From beak to snout, health is the way!

mission.title: To keep your bowl from emptying...
mission.description: We'll provide information about pet nutrition in an accessible way, focusing on nutritional well-being and prosperous life.

value.title: In our nest, you'll find...
value.description: A lot of affection for pets and commitment to taking care of their diet, all in an accessible way and with quality information.

vision.title: Thinking about taking flight...
vision.description: We'll take our platform to mobile apps, we'll take information about pet food all over the world, we'll be the benchmark for pet food experts and pet owners.

content.text: Our logo is related to the Pets we are taking care of:
Our name is the union of 3 words:
From Beak to Snout, Health is the Way!

list.item1: From Beak to Snout - Refers to the pets we work with
list.item2: Health is the Way - Talks about what we are bringing

colors.color1: Orange is our main color, representing our care and love for pets.
colors.color2: Caramel is a strong color that contrasts with the others, and also refers to pets of this color.
colors.color3: Cream is a soft color and serves as an anchor for the other colors.
colors.color4: Light Brown brings an air of sophistication and simplicity to our platform.

ods.title: Sustainable Development Goal
ods.contentTitle: Health and Well-Being of Domestic Animals
ods.content: Our SDG aims to ensure adequate care and healthy nutrition for pets. Focusing on responsible breeding practices, access to quality veterinary services, and safe environments, this SDG promotes the physical and emotional well-being of animals, strengthening the bonds between humans and their pets and contributing to more compassionate communities.

item1.title: Environmental Crimes Law (1998, Law No. 9,605)
item1.content: Synopsis: Provides for criminal and administrative sanctions derived from conduct and activities harmful to the environment, and establishes other provisions.

item2.title: Bill 1070/22
item2.content: Aims to make it the obligation of pet owners to ensure the physical and mental well-being of their pets, including care for nutrition, hygiene, health, and accommodation.

contentFeeding.warning: CaliPet recommends that you take your pet to a veterinarian before feeding them our recipes.

item1.text2: to get to know him better!

item2.text2: to keep him happy, safe, and healthy!

item3.text2: that is essential for your friend!
